Title: Grants peace officer status to certain public safety officers employed by Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute
Summary: Grants peace officer status to certain public safety officers employed by Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute, who are designated as such by the president in concurrence with the board of trustees.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law, in relation to granting peace officer status to certain public safety officers employed by Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute
